long_description: The Manduka eQua Yoga Hand Towel serves double duty as a germ-resistant gym towel or a space-saving, highly absorbent travel or hiking towel. Multipurpose towel is extremely light, yet plush, durable, super-absorbent and quick-drying. Tightly woven fibers create a soft, suede-like feel. Split microfiber fabric optimizes moisture absorption and evaporation; it becomes slip-resistant when damp. The Manduka eQua Yoga Hand Towel withstands countless washings.
short_description: The Manduka eQua Yoga Hand Towel serves double duty as a germ-resistant gym towel or a space-saving, highly absorbent travel or hiking towel.
